statements: SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_patterns;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_frequency FROM crop_rotation_patterns ORDER BY rotation_frequency ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE rotation_frequency > 3;
SELECT id, crop_name, last_rotation_date FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE optimal_soil_condition = 'Loamy';
SELECT crop_name, rotation_frequency, last_rotation_date FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE optimal_soil_condition = 'Sandy' ORDER BY last_rotation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE rotation_frequency > 3 ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT id, crop_name FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE optimal_soil_condition = 'Loamy' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT crop_name, last_rotation_date FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE optimal_soil_condition = 'Sandy' AND rotation_frequency < 4
SELECT id, rotation_frequency, optimal_soil_condition FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE crop_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY optimal_soil_condition ASC, rotation_frequency DESC
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE last_rotation_date > '2020-01-01' AND optimal_soil_condition IN ('Clay', 'Sandy') ORDER BY last_rotation_date ASC
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crop_rotation_patterns;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable';
SELECT crop_name, last_rotated_date FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE last_rotated_date < '2022-10-01';
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crop_rotation_patterns ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, last_rotated_date FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY last_rotated_date DESC
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE crop_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE last_rotated_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' AND crop_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY crop_name
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, crop_type FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE crop_name <> 'Potato' ORDER BY crop_type, crop_name
SELECT * FROM CropRotation ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_order FROM CropRotation WHERE rotation_order > 2;
SELECT field_name, size FROM Field WHERE size < 10;
SELECT crop_id, rotation_date FROM RotationHistory WHERE rotation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CropRotation INNER JOIN Field ON CropRotation.id = Field.id;
SELECT * FROM CropRotation ORDER BY rotation_order DESC, crop_name ASC;
SELECT field_name, size, CR.crop_name FROM Field F JOIN CropRotation CR ON F.id = CR.id WHERE size > 10;

SELECT RH.rotation_date, F.field_name, CR.crop_name FROM RotationHistory RH JOIN Field F ON RH.field_id = F.id JOIN CropRotation CR ON RH.crop_id = CR.id WHERE RH.rotation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT CR.crop_name, COUNT(*) AS total_rotations FROM CropRotation CR JOIN RotationHistory RH ON CR.id = RH.crop_id GROUP BY CR.crop_name HAVING total_rotations > 5;

SELECT F.field_name, CR.crop_name, RH.rotation_date FROM Field F LEFT JOIN RotationHistory RH ON F.id = RH.field_id LEFT JOIN CropRotation CR ON RH.crop_id = CR.id WHERE RH.rotation_date IS NULL AND CR.crop_name LIKE 'Wheat%';
SELECT * FROM CropRotationPatterns;
SELECT crop_id, rotation_type FROM CropRotationPatterns WHERE rotation_year = 2022;
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM FarmFields ORDER BY field_size DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_age FROM Farmers WHERE farmer_location = 'California';
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, crop_family FROM Crops WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY crop_name;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationPatterns WHERE rotation_year > 2020 ORDER BY rotation_year DESC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM Crops WHERE crop_family = 'Legumes';
SELECT f.farmer_name, ff.field_name, cr.crop_type, cr.rotation_type FROM Farmers f JOIN FarmFields ff ON f.id = ff.id JOIN CropRotationPatterns cr ON ff.id = cr.crop_id;

SELECT f.farmer_name, f.farmer_age, ff.field_name, cr.rotation_year FROM Farmers f JOIN FarmFields ff ON f.id = ff.id JOIN CropRotationPatterns cr ON ff.crop_id = cr.id WHERE f.farmer_location = 'California';

SELECT cr.rotation_year, cr.rotation_type, c.crop_name FROM CropRotationPatterns cr JOIN Crops c ON cr.crop_id = c.id WHERE c.crop_type = 'Vegetables' AND cr.rotation_year < 2022 ORDER BY cr.rotation_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_patterns;
SELECT field_id, crop_name, planting_season FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE rotation_year > 2020;
SELECT field_name, field_size, soil_type FROM field_information ORDER BY field_size DESC;
SELECT variety_name, planting_depth FROM crop_varieties WHERE harvest_period = 'Fall';
SELECT record_id, field_id, planting_date FROM planting_records ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_patterns WHERE rotation_year > 2020;
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM field_information WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' ORDER BY field_size DESC;
SELECT crop_name, variety_name FROM crop_varieties WHERE planting_depth IN ('Shallow', 'Deep');
SELECT planting_date, harvest_date FROM planting_records JOIN harvest_records ON planting_records.record_id = harvest_records.record_id;
SELECT field_id, COUNT(variety_id) AS num_varieties FROM planting_records GROUP BY field_id HAVING num_varieties > 1 ORDER BY num_varieties DESC;
